action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: This is an image of a kitchen with dark wood cabinetry, a granite countertop, and a stainless steel gas stove. There is a large window above the sink, and a chandelier hanging from the ceiling. The floor is made of hardwood.

DESCRIPTION: A woman is crouching down, smiling at a young child who is standing on a skateboard. The child is wearing an orange shirt with the word "BEARS" on it and blue pants. They are indoors, with a living room setting visible in the background, including a couch, a chair, and a table with various items on it.
